NumberInputProps.name: decimalScale
NumberInputProps.description: The maximum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values range from 0 to 14. Setting to true will result in the maximum size, setting to false will allow 0 decimals, whole numbers only.

NumberInputProps.name: defaultValue
NumberInputProps.description: Initial value of an uncontrolled component

NumberInputProps.name: error
NumberInputProps.description:
Controls the error state of the `Input`, changing the
background color and border colors to red

NumberInputProps.name: fillDecimalScale
NumberInputProps.description:
none prevents from adding zeros to match given decimalScale.
always automatically adds zeros to match given decimalScale.
onBlur automatically adds zeros to match given{' '} decimalScale when input has lost focus.

NumberInputProps.name: locale
NumberInputProps.description: A string with a BCP 47 language tag or an array of such strings which specifies number formatting.

NumberInputProps.name: prefix
NumberInputProps.description: A string which is added to input as a prefix.

NumberInputProps.name: step
NumberInputProps.description: A stepping interval which is used in incrementer. Zero value turns off incrementer.

NumberInputProps.name: suffix
NumberInputProps.description: A string which is added to input as a suffix

NumberInputProps.name: onChange
NumberInputProps.description: `(value: ValueChange) => void`, where `ValueChange` is an object `{ value: string, parsedNumber: number | null }`.

UseNumberFormatConfig.name: decimalScale
UseNumberFormatConfig.description: The maximum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values range from 0 to 14. Setting to true will result in the maximum size, setting to false will allow 0 decimals, whole numbers only.

UseNumberFormatConfig.name: fillDecimalScale
UseNumberFormatConfig.description:
none prevents from adding zeros to match given decimalScale.
always automatically adds zeros to match given decimalScale.
onBlur automatically adds zeros to match given{' '} decimalScale when input has lost focus.

UseNumberFormatConfig.name: locale
UseNumberFormatConfig.description: A string with a BCP 47 language tag or an array of such strings which specifies number formatting.
